website_summaries.verdict: The Specifique Bain Divalent Shampoo leaves hair feeling soft, supple, and light.
pros: This shampoo works to nourish and balance the scalp while minimizing oil-causing moisture

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this shampoo, I just expected more out of it. I have been using it for over 3 weeks now and I have not really seen a difference in the oiliness of my scalp. I am still washing my hair every other day because of excessive oil build ups.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercakies

customer_reviews.title: Not colorsafe
customer_reviews.text: The product smells a little different than the store bought one. This is not color safe
customer_reviews.author: Levey

customer_reviews.title: This champoo smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, smells great. This is not for everyday.. is strong, I use one day and another champoo a different day. If you have damaged ends I use: Its a 10" leave in. Or kerastase leave in damaged ends level of erosion 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Not the same in the amazon picture
customer_reviews.text: It was not the same that is in the amazon picture and it didn't work for me. It seems kind of fake.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can recommend this shampoo. It's really good for oily hair
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stanojevic

customer_reviews.title: still oily
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on different shampoos for oily scalp and dry longer hair and had hopes this would let me go 4 days or so without a oily scalp. I have long layered Ombre/Bayalage hair and don't like to shampoo more than every 4 to 5 days (dry shampoo day 3 and or 4) yet this didn't really do much to help in that department. Will keep on looking I guess!
customer_reviews.author: TravelerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: first time keratase user
customer_reviews.text: i have an oily scalp and dry roots. i didn't find that the shampoo made that much of a difference at the end of the day compared to other shampoos i've tried. however, i loved the scent and the way my hair felt after. i may buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is, but I have used this shampoo for years. The last order I received doesn't feel the same. It now leaves my hair oilier than ever and feels so heavy. I'm not a 100% this is a authentic Keratase product, so just be careful. I will not be buying from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: 808techmama

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I been using this shampoo for years. But now it's discontinued at kerastase. And I was afraid getting this shampoo online. So I decided I'll buy. Also arrived on time. And its real kerastase. I love this shampoo. It leaves your hair soft and clean scalp. No more oil scalp. I really love it the way it's leaves my hair and my scalp. I really recommend it to anyone who has oil scalp and sensitive lengths.
customer_reviews.author: kar

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Kerastase!! :) :)
customer_reviews.text: I had a condition on my scalp, little white balls, nastiness, I don't know what it was. I've tried the anti-fungal shampoo, and it helped a little bit but then I bought this one and started using it everyday,and now the problem is way better and my hair is less oily too! I am sooooo happy with this shampoo! Thank You Kerastase! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I want!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Keratase for 2 years. I love it since it make my hair smooth, and firm. Encourage to buy one, though the shipping is not fast as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Xianglun Mao
